a wonderful place!
we were tired and cold when we got to the restaurant, then we sat down to begin ordering appetizers.
we were told that they were booked solid and no other table was available.
to my right, the hostess stood over a busboy and hissed rapido, rapido as he tried to clear and re-set a table for six.

i'm partial to the gnocchi.
note that they do not serve beer, you must bring your own.
from the appetizers we ate, the dim sum and other variety of foods, it was impossible to criticize the food.
